data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated August 01 2025 regarding the scheduled earnings conference call with analysts/investors on Thursday August 07 2025 at 04:00 PM (IST) we are sharing a revised copy of the invite. 
Please note that the earlier invite contained an inaccessible link to join the call. The updated invite now including an accessible link (Diamond Pass) is attached herewith for your reference.
All the other details made in the earlier intimation will remain the same.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
In continuation to our letter dated July 29 2025 wherein we informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on Tuesday August 05 2025 we would like to notify that an earnings conference call with analysts/ investors is planned for Thursday August 07 2025 at 4:00 PM (IST). 

A copy of the invite is enclosed herewith.

We request you to kindly take the above on record.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 01 2025 the equity shares of Ellenbarrie Industrial Gases Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544421) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250630- dated June 30 2025.
